section.title: End of an Evil Existence
section.p: An angry Gaston turns the town against the beast, leading them to march over and storm the castle. Gaston confronts the beast and attacks him, shooting and injuring him badly. While attempting to get back up off the ground, Gaston falls to his death, finally getting what was coming to him, even though it had been a long time coming. Belle, the beast, and all the inhabitants of the castle are finally safe from harm.

section.title: End of an Evil Existence
section.p: An angry Gaston turns the town against the beast, leading them to march over and storm the castle. Gaston confronts the beast and attacks him, shooting and injuring him badly. But you know what they say--Karma's a b---h! So, while attempting to get back up off the ground, Gaston falls to his death, finally getting what was coming to him, even though it had been a long time coming. Belle, the beast, and all the inhabitants of the castle are finally safe from harm.

image.alt: Gaston and village members ride on horseback and/or walk to the castle to raid it.
